mdRecord.dcterms:title: 16557 Old Custis House of Washington's Courting Days, Williamsburg, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of house in Williamsburg, Virginia where George Washington courted Martha Dandridge Custis. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount read: Keystone View Company Manufactures, Publishers, Copyrighted Made in the U. S. A. Meadville, Pa., New York, N. Y., Chicago, Ill. London, England. Title - 16557 Old Custis House of Washington's Courting Days, Williamsburg, Va. [Part of a series] 6.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Williamsburg (Va.)
